basics.name: Pranav Bhosale
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with over four years of experience working with Java, Spring Boot, Amazon Web Services, K8s. Passionate about climate-tech

education.institution: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS Pilani)

work.name: DigiCert Inc.
work.summary: Leading global provider of Digital Trust and Public Key Infrastructure
highlights: Building Trust Lifecycle Manager, a full-stack solution for centralized digital trust needs of enterprises
Solving for Post Quantum Cryptography certificate issuance

work.name: Verizon
work.summary: BlueJeans by Verizon: Enterprise grade virtual events and webinar platform
highlights: Developed and maintained Spring based microservices for BlueJeans Events that supported upto 500k attendees in web conferences with significant primary ownership of around 10 microservices
Integrated an RTMP video streaming solution utilizing Amazon IVS enabling delivery of low-latency content. Requested by over 30 enterprise customers

Pioneered a GDPR-compliant user data deletion feature, leveraging AWS Step Functions to systematically purge user data, facilitating the daily deletion of thousands of users in alignment with European regulations
Implemented real-time alerting for various scheduled tasks, encompassing billing alerts, event registrations and reminders, and multiple health checks
Interned for five months from Aug-Dec 2020, concluding with a return offer

work.name: Superset
work.summary: Recruitment infrastructure to manage campus hiring
highlights: Worked with a small team contributing to web apps utilized by 600+ universities and 3500+ companies
Developed a data collection portal for Capgemini with AngularJS frontend and Java-Spring backend, instrumental in collecting placement data for colleges and hiring over 15,000 freshers

Pioneered a GDPR-compliant user data deletion feature, leveraging AWS Step Functions to systematically purge user data, facilitating the daily deletion of thousands of users in alignment with European regulations

Automated high-load technical support through Zoho Workflows, nearly eliminating manual email responses that previously took over 2 days. Also established a subscriptions marketplace for university clients

work.name: Leap Club
highlights: Conducted research on cost-effective, portable, and swift food authentication, identifying NIR spectroscopy as the optimal technique and exploring ML models for the classification of organic food

work.name: Community Energy Labs
highlights: Implemented a demo of the open source energy flexibility and demand-side management (DSM) platform PowerMatcher

work.name: Saar GeoSpatial
highlights: Engaged closely in the creation and management of geographic data for a tree census conducted by the Mumbai Municipal Corporation (MCGM)
Developed expertise in ArcGIS, handling vector and raster data, geodatabases, ArcToolbox, and environmental analysis, along with the publication of web maps

projects.name: Invasive Species Monitoring
projects.summary: Convolutional Neural Networks, Tensorflow, Keras, numpy, pandas
highlights: Explored the biological consequences of globalization and the challenges posed by invasive species for a term paper
Applied a CNN model to a Kaggle Dataset, achieving a 75% accuracy in identifying hydrangeas

projects.name: NIR Spectroscopy based Apple Classification
highlights: Successfully reproduced the findings of a paper predicting apple origin through spectral data from NIR spectroscopy
Reduced dimensionality via Principal Component Analysis, and trained a Support Vector Machine model achieving 100% accuracy in binary classification of apples

projects.name: Nand to Tetris
projects.summary: Build a Modern Computer from First Principles
highlights: Built components like logic gates, adders, multiplexers and demultiplexers, Arithmetic Logic Unit (ALU) and a CPU

projects.name: Simple Markov Chain
projects.summary: Takes in a text file as input to create a simple markov chain. Based on the input corpus, generates a sequence of words.

volunteer.summary: Core member of the team that managed 80+ volunteers and conducted over 25 events throughout the year
highlights: Managed social media presence of the NGO, in-charge of event publicity, designing newsletters, social media posts, and posters. Personally led a team of 10 volunteers
Part of the team of 30+ volunteers that tutored underprivileged high school children for three years. Was instrumental in providing academic assistance and imparting holistic education
Conducted one-on-one meetings over six months for software developer interview preparation, data structures and algorithms practice, mock interviews, and resume reviews.
Mentored two students from disadvantaged backgrounds (from Liberia and India) in basic computer science concepts and web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
